com.airs.platform

Class SensorRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airs.platform.SensorRepository

  • public class SensorRepository
extends Object
    Maintains a repository of all locally available sensors

    • Method Detail

      • deleteSensor

        public static void deleteSensor()
        Delete all sensors (by simply setting the first sensor reference to null}

      • insertSensor

        public static void insertSensor(String Symbol,
                String Unit,
                String Description,
                String Explanation,
                String type,
                int scaler,
                int min,
                int max,
                boolean hasHistory,
                int poll,
                Handler handler)
        Inserts new sensor in list, calling appropriate Sensor instance
        Parameters:
        Symbol - String of the sensor symbol (used for retrieving sensors)
        Unit - String of the sensor unit (used in titles of visualisations)
        Description - String of the sensor description (used in titles of visualisations)
        type - String with the type of the sensor (used in the recording thread to handle data differently)
        scaler - Scaler of the values as an exponent of 10
        min - Minimum value of the sensor, if supported, expressed with the scaler in mind
        max - Maximum value of the sensor, if supported, expressed with the scaler in mind
        hasHistory - Flag if Handler implementing the sensor supports history for it
        poll - Polling time in millisecond - if zero, the handler will block properly when called frequently, e.g., realising the recording through a callback
        handler - Reference to the Handler implementing the sensor

      • setSensorStatus

        public static void setSensorStatus(String Symbol,
                   int status,
                   String reason,
                   Runnable thread)
        Finds sensor based on Symbol and sets valid flag
        Parameters:
        Symbol - String to sensor symbol trying to find
        status - Status of sensor after being found
        reason - Status string of sensor after being found
        thread - Reference to Runnable of the acquisition thread being used right now

      • getSensorStatus

        public static int getSensorStatus(String Symbol)
        Finds sensor based on Symbol and returns its current status
        Parameters:
        Symbol - String of the sensor symbol to be found
        Returns:
        status of the sensor, SENSOR_INVALID if nothing is found

      • findHandler

        public static Handler findHandler(String Symbol)
        Finds sensor based on Symbol and returns handler serving sensor
        Parameters:
        Symbol - String of the sensor symbol to be found
        Returns:
        Reference to the Handler that implements the sensor symbol

      • findSensor

        public static Sensor findSensor(String Symbol)
        Finds sensor based on Symbol and returns reference to the Sensor
        Parameters:
        Symbol - String of the sensor symbol to be found
        Returns:
        Reference to the Sensor of this symbol

      • findScaler

        public static int findScaler(String Symbol)
        Finds sensor based on Symbol and returns its scaler
        Parameters:
        Symbol - String of the sensor symbol to be found
        Returns:
        Scaler of the sensor being found
